casebody.data:
HIRAM BENNER et al., Plaintiffs, v. DAVID H. BALDWIN, Defendant.

Before Freedman, Van Vorst and Speir, JJ.

Decided December 9, 1874. Appeal from a judgment in favor of the plaintiff for the balance of a bill of cotton sold to the defendant. Both parties appealed from the same. Nelson, Cook & Thorn, for plaintiffs. Evarts, Southmayd & Choate, for defendants.

Judgment affirmed.

Opinion by Speir, J., Freedman and Van Vorst, JJ., concurring.
